name: Nirvana (Montech Entertainment)
description:
NOTE: This game is currently in Prototype stage and serves as a proof of concept.

Story:

The seal has finally broken as prophesized and the Old Master awakened from his death. With the power of Muramasa, the Demonic Sword he goes on the journey to recover his Soul in order to open the Gate of Salvation. His soul was split in two parts. Yin, which is held by the Mightiest Shogun and Yang is held by the Divine Monk.

Controls:

Movement - W, A, S, D
Jump - Space
Dash- Left Shift
Attack- Left Click (Mouse)
Block- Right Click (Mouse)
